common.ourStoryDesc: Providing comprehensive fiber optic network solutions to meet the needs of all types of businesses
common.successStoriesDesc: See how our fiber optic solutions have transformed businesses across various industries
common.testimonialsDesc: Hear what our clients have to say about our fiber optic solutions and services

service1.title: Professional Fiber Installation
service1.description: Our expert team plans and installs high-speed fiber optic networks for your business, ensuring optimal performance and reliability

service2.title: Enterprise Network Solutions
service2.description: Comprehensive network solutions providing high-speed, stable, and secure enterprise network environments

service3.title: 24/7 Technical Support
service3.description: Round-the-clock professional technical support ensures your network runs smoothly and resolves any issues quickly

caseStudy1.title: Submarine Cable
caseStudy1.heading: World's First Ultra-High Core Count Digital Submarine Cable
caseStudy1.description: We have successfully deployed the Ultra Express Link (UEL), the world's first submarine cable equipped with 2,016 optical fiber cores, directly connecting the data centers in Tseung Kwan O and Chai Wan.
caseStudy1.imageAlt: IT professional monitoring network performance in a modern data center

points.1: Ultra-high capacity with 2,016 optical fiber cores
points.2: The shortest submarine cable path of only 2.76 km

caseStudy2.title: Lamma Island
caseStudy2.heading: Lamma Island Fibre Network Coverage Project
caseStudy2.description: We have successfully built a fibre network on Lamma Island, offering residents their first residential high-speed broadband experience. The network is expected to cover 19 villages on the island within this year, delivering symmetrical speeds of up to 10Gbps.

caseStudy3.title: 800G AI Superhighway
caseStudy3.heading: 800G AI Superhighway
caseStudy3.description: FiberLink's 800G AI Superhighway service is purpose-built for AI, high-performance computing, cloud, and data center interconnection. It meets the high-bandwidth demands of the new era, enabling data flow and computing power convergence in the age of AI and supercomputing.

points.2: Scalable AI computing integration and expansion
points.3: Supports supercomputing centers, science parks, tech enterprises, and universities

testimonial1.quote: FiberLink's enterprise network solution transformed our operations. The speed and reliability have been exceptional, and their support team is always responsive.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Chen

testimonial2.quote: We needed a network that could handle massive data transfers for our research projects. FiberLink delivered a solution that exceeded our expectations and scaled with our needs.
testimonial2.author: Dr. Michael Wong

testimonial3.quote: The reliability of our network is critical for patient care. Since implementing FiberLink's solution, we've had zero downtime and significantly improved our digital healthcare services.
testimonial3.author: Jennifer Lau

hero.ourExpertTeamProvidesHighSpeedStableAndS: Our expert team provides high-speed, stable, and secure fiber optic infrastructure to ensure your business runs smoothly
